content:
Welcome! üëã Hi, you’ve wandered to the about page.
About the Site Welcome to David’s idea sharing site. Here you will find ramblings about topics like:
privacy & cybersecurity ML & data science Neat books Good podcast recommendations Maybe some artwork too *Note: topics list is growing and subject to change
Recently, infrared radiation was recorded from the deepest pocket of space we’ve seen (albeit for a small slice) of our known Universe. It took in the order of 1010 years for this information to reach your computer screen, I commit to posting at least more often than it has taken for this deep space to reach you üëç
Deep UniversePhoto by NASA‚Äôs James Webb Telescope
About the Author Greetings.
I am David Moreno, born and raised in the Minneapolis, and currently living in California.
I enjoy spending my time learning new things, spending time outdoors, and spending time with my family. Discovering activities that allow for all three at the same time is the sweet spot, if you got leads on this please let me know. Here is a fun pseudonymized pictured of myself next to an Alpaca.
Pixelated engineer & an Alpaca, Circa 2019Engineer makes poor attempt at privacy joke in ‘about me’ section
In my copious amounts of free time I’m excited to bring to you some neat stuff I know.
Want more about me? I’ll keep it short:
Likes Traveling and trying new foods Meeting people’s pets üê∂ üê±… esp. those with human names Music, all kinds Dislikes lists without at least one item on them Thanks for checking out my blog / site. I hope you find some of this material educational, or at least entertaining.
Enjoy your stay.
- D
